snippet: The decline in the nine participating Northeastern and mid-Atlantic states can be attributed not just to the carbon market, but to the cheap price of natural gas, improved energy efficiency programs and an economic decline.
abstract: The decline in the nine participating Northeastern and mid-Atlantic states can be attributed not just to the carbon market, but to the cheap price of natural gas, improved energy efficiency programs and an economic decline.

headline.main: Emissions Fell Under Cap and Trade Program, Report Says
